headline: CenterPoint Energy reaches settlement agreement on landmark Systemwide Resiliency Plan to strengthen Houston electric system against extreme weather threats and future hazards
summary: Largest single resiliency investment in CenterPoint history will build on Greater Houston Resiliency Initiative and help address impacts of wide range of extreme weather and other threats100% of...

headline: Duke Energy's Unit Seeks Rate Hike to Build Smarter Grid
summary: DUK's unit seeks a $74.8M rate hike in South Carolina to fund grid upgrades and increase the reliability of its services.
